flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: We started with 3 PVC pipes: A long pipe, a medium pipe, and a little pipe; and a PVC cap. And one day my father had an idea to give the blaster sound and light effects, because we had a card from a Force FX lightsaber made by Master Replica.
lines.text_raw: We started with 3 PVC pipes: A long pipe, a medium pipe, and a little pipe; and a PVC cap. And one day my father had an idea to give the blaster sound and light effects, because we had a card from a Force FX lightsaber made by Master Replica.

lines.text: We also used a broken Airsoft gun and its charger, some old computer memory sticks, a speaker, a plastic diamond, some Luxeon LEDs, and 2 PVC pipe couplers.
lines.text_raw: We also used a broken Airsoft gun and its charger, some old computer memory sticks, a speaker, a plastic diamond, some Luxeon LEDs, and 2 PVC pipe couplers.

lines.text: We tested the sound card and created a circuit board to mount the LEDs to (picture 3 is the design of the circuit).
lines.text_raw: We tested the sound card and created a circuit board to mount the LEDs to (picture 3 is the design of the circuit).

lines.text: We soldered all wires and all components.
lines.text_raw: We soldered all wires and all components.

lines.text: We put Luxeon LEDs in the medium pipe.
lines.text_raw: We put Luxeon LEDs in the medium pipe.

lines.text: We lined the medium pipe with a material to diffuse the light.
lines.text_raw: We lined the medium pipe with a material to diffuse the light.

lines.text: Here's what the blaster looks like at this stage.
lines.text_raw: Here's what the blaster looks like at this stage.

lines.text: We pierced the cap and put the diamond in and glued it.
lines.text_raw: We pierced the cap and put the diamond in and glued it.

lines.text: We put the cap and the diamond in the medium pipe to diffuse the light because the Luxeon LEDs are very bright and dangerous for your eyes.
lines.text_raw: We put the cap and the diamond in the medium pipe to diffuse the light because the Luxeon LEDs are very bright and dangerous for your eyes.

lines.text: We glued the memory chips on the blaster grip and in the charger slot (you can see them in the pictures) and we were finished.
lines.text_raw: We glued the memory chips on the blaster grip and in the charger slot (you can see them in the pictures) and we were finished.
